statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY part_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_id, part_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE part_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY part_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY part_name;
SELECT part_name, location FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY location, part_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM spare_parts WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM spare_parts WHERE part_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Machine';
SELECT part_name, part_description, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE part_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment_name, part_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id JOIN spare_parts ON maintenance_records.part_id = spare_parts.part_id;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM spare_parts WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity >= 10 AND price <= 50;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_records m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM spare_parts WHERE part_id IN (SELECT part_id FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-05-15');
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, part_name FROM spare_parts ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%weekly%';
SELECT id, item_id, action_type FROM inventory_logs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts ORDER BY part_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.id = maintenance_records.equipment_id;
SELECT part_name, location FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM equipment GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT staff_name, department FROM maintenance_staff WHERE staff_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 5 AND manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT staff_name, department FROM maintenance_staff WHERE department IN ('Electrical', 'Mechanical') ORDER BY staff_name;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
